text: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ زِدۡنَٰهُمۡ عَذَابٗا فَوۡقَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ بِمَا كَانُواْ يُفۡسِدُونَ
translation: 88. Nabiyow koroositeeh sinam Yallih gitak waase maral digaala digaalak bagul keenil osisne, addunyal koroosannuu kee uma taamat baaxo bayisak sugeenimih sabbatah.
